import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const customStyle = { "paddingRight": 20 } const AddRestaurant = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [location, setLocation] = useState(""); const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState("Price Range"); return (
{setName(e.target.value)}} className='form-control m-2' type='text' placeholder='Name'>
{setLocation(e.target.value)}} className='form-control m-2' type='text' placeholder='Location'>
) } export default AddRestaurant
